ad_text: K&B Transportation Sponsored Stop worrying about pay with a salaried position! K&B Transportation an opening for a dedicated driver in your area! K&B Transportation Sponsored Drivers, come join K&B Transportation as we are one of the Top Refrigerated Fleets to pull for in the country. We are looking for the TOP drivers within the industry, you know who you are! LEARN MORE NEW $1,625 WEEKLY GUARANTEE Are you a road warrior? 2 Months Out, Paid 10 Days Off. K&B Transportation Sponsored Sometimes, drivers want and need a new opportunity to rejuvenate their passion as a truck driver. Here at K&B we are a family owned business and our drivers are our #1 asset, you will be treated as such. You will drive very nice equipment (2020 or newer Freightliner Cascadia). You will make up to .70 cpm and earn $90k + your first year within this fleet. You will also be guaranteed $1,625 per week but you can easily out earn the minimum and make $2,000+ on top weeks. If you have 6 months of OTR experience, you should really consider this opportunity. Apply now in less than 1 minute. DRIVE4KBTRANSPORTATION.COM Drive for K&B Transportation Offering free flight services for drivers outside of our regional area. K&B Transportation Sponsored Here at K&B Transportation we understand our OTR drivers have different desires regarding home time. We have a couple of different options with YOU in mind. Our Regional fleet is home roughly every 12-14 days and starts drivers off at .60 cpm ($1,500 per week guaranteed, $1,800+ on top weeks, $80k+ annually). Our Road Warrior fleet is out for 60 days at a time with 10 days off. This job you will make up to .70 cpm ( be guaranteed $1,625 per week, $2,000+ on top weeks, $90k+ annually). We want to talk with you about these driving positions. You must have 6 month OTR experience. Please apply now. DRIVE4KBTRANSPORTATION.COM Drive for K&B Transportation Only Class A CDL & 6 months OTR experience required. Apply now

K&B Transportation Sponsored K&B Transportation is NOT a mega carrier. We are a family owned trucking company where the owners and all employees roll up their sleeves. As a company, we know we don’t exist without our drivers. That’s why it is important to us that our drivers earn great pay, great benefits package and some of the best equipment to drive. We have a few different driver jobs that we have an immediate need for depending on where you live (Dedicated, Regional and Road Warrior jobs ). These jobs you will earn $80k+ to over $90k+ annually, your first year with us! You must have 6 months OTR experience. Please apply now to speak with a recruiter, it will take less than 1 minute DRIVE4KBTRANSPORTATION.COM Drive for K&B Transportation Class A CDL & 6 months OTR experience required. Apply now
